item.title: Help hurry broke my server
item.dc:creator: @firehead262 firehead262
item.description:
@firehead262 wrote:

ok so i got a slight maybe major problem i was toying with some of my commands and changed one a lil it was caled ::godownz} else if (command.startsWith("godownz") && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("ralan")) { teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; heightLevel -= 1;
was the code i was toying with and changed the height lvl to 2 then back to the orginal one now when i used the code it set all my npcs to 49 hight lvl reseting my server didnt work and i cant think of how to put them back to 0 considering i am still up thier too
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 04, 2008, 10:55:16 pm[/size][hr]actualy the prob i got is that my character is the only one this high or low upon login in to another acc i found that those work fine but my acc is stuck up higher and i would prefer to keep the account i have although itsnothing to make anohter acc owner but i dont wna have to change some player name sensiteve stuff
